overview: In order to reach spiritual enlightenment, one sweater-vested young man must face a dancing Oldsmobile, endure a boozy encounter with God on a frozen tundra, and brush his teeth, comb his hair, floss, Q-Tip, lather and shave simultaneously. "Doxology" combines groundbreaking stop-motion animation techniques and unusual storytelling with the time-honored quest for spiritual awakening.
title: Doxology
